pull.title: psbt: Check non witness utxo outpoint early
pull.body: A common issue that our fuzzers keep finding is that outpoints don't exist in the non witness utxos. Instead of trying to track this down and checking in various individual places, do the check early during deserialization. This also unifies the error message returned for this class of problems.

events.message:
psbt: Check non witness utxo outpoint early

A common issue that our fuzzers keep finding is that outpoints don't
exist in the non witness utxos. Instead of trying to track this down and
checking in various individual places, do the check early during
deserialization.
